description: This is a React component file defining the main App component for a simple frontend application. It manages theme toggling between light and dark modes using React hooks and renders UI elements including a toggle button, logo, informational text, and a link.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component that manages theme state and renders the application UI.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to switch the theme between 'light' and 'dark'.
